languages.text: "Что-то коммунальщики совсем распоясались — у них тут разлив гов... эм, нечистот под центральной площадью, а они... О-о-о, вот что за запашок я последний раз во дворце Владайма учуяла! Ха-ха, ему подходит".

traits.locale_text: "Что-то коммунальщики совсем распоясались — у них тут разлив гов... эм, нечистот под центральной площадью, а они... О-о-о, вот что за запашок я последний раз во дворце Владайма учуяла! Ха-ха, ему подходит".

languages.text: "Looks like the utility folks have really let themselves go; they've got shi— ahem, sewage spilling out right under the central square, but they just — eugh, so that's what I smelled last time I was in Vladaym's palace! Ha ha, the stench suits him."
languages.original_text: "Что-то коммунальщики совсем распоясались — у них тут разлив гов... эм, нечистот под центральной площадью, а они... О-о-о, вот что за запашок я последний раз во дворце Владайма учуяла! Ха-ха, ему подходит".

traits.locale_text: "Looks like the utility folks have really let themselves go; they've got shi— ahem, sewage spilling out right under the central square, but they just — eugh, so that's what I smelled last time I was in Vladaym's palace! Ha ha, the stench suits him."
"Looks like the utility folks have really let themselves go with Vladaym at the reins — they've got a shit spill right under the central square, and they don't have a care in the world!"

"Looks like the utility folks have really let themselves go; they've got shi— ahem, sewage spilling out right under the central square, but they just — eugh, so that's what I smelled last time I was in Vladaym's palace! Ha ha, the stench suits him."

"Looks like the utility folks have really let themselves go; they've got shi— ahem, sewage spilling out right under the central square, but they just — eugh, so that's what I smelled last time I was in Vladaym's palace! Ha ha, the stench suits him."

languages.text: “看来公用设备部门的人真是吃闲饭的。这些屎——咳，这些污水就在中央广场下面四处横流，可他们却——哎哟，原来我之前在弗拉迪姆的宫殿里闻到的味道，就是这个味道！哈哈，这臭味还挺适合他的。”
languages.original_text: "Looks like the utility folks have really let themselves go; they've got shi— ahem, sewage spilling out right under the central square, but they just — eugh, so that's what I smelled last time I was in Vladaym's palace! Ha ha, the stench suits him."

traits.locale_text: “看来公用设备部门的人真是吃闲饭的。这些屎——咳，这些污水就在中央广场下面四处横流，可他们却——哎哟，原来我之前在弗拉迪姆的宫殿里闻到的味道，就是这个味道！哈哈，这臭味还挺适合他的。”

languages.text: «Parece que los de mantenimiento son unos dejados. Hay un montón de mie... de residuos debajo de la plaza central, pero ellos ni... ¡puaj, así que eso es lo que olí en mi última visita al palacio de Vladaym! ¡Ja, ja! Le pega este pestazo».
languages.original_text: "Looks like the utility folks have really let themselves go; they've got shi— ahem, sewage spilling out right under the central square, but they just — eugh, so that's what I smelled last time I was in Vladaym's palace! Ha ha, the stench suits him."

traits.locale_text: «Parece que los de mantenimiento son unos dejados. Hay un montón de mie... de residuos debajo de la plaza central, pero ellos ni... ¡puaj, así que eso es lo que olí en mi última visita al palacio de Vladaym! ¡Ja, ja! Le pega este pestazo».

languages.text: 「公益事業に携わる人たちがだいぶ仕事をサボってるみたいね。クソ…コホン、下水が中央広場の真下に垂れ流し状態で―ごほっ、前回ヴラダイムの宮廷にいた時に嗅いだ臭いはこれだったんだ！あはは、あいつにはお似合いだわ」
languages.original_text: "Looks like the utility folks have really let themselves go; they've got shi— ahem, sewage spilling out right under the central square, but they just — eugh, so that's what I smelled last time I was in Vladaym's palace! Ha ha, the stench suits him."

traits.locale_text: 「公益事業に携わる人たちがだいぶ仕事をサボってるみたいね。クソ…コホン、下水が中央広場の真下に垂れ流し状態で―ごほっ、前回ヴラダイムの宮廷にいた時に嗅いだ臭いはこれだったんだ！あはは、あいつにはお似合いだわ」

languages.text: "Anscheinend haben die vom Arbeitstrupp diesmal richtig geschlampt. Direkt unter dem Hauptplatz tritt Sch..., äh, Abwasser aus, und sie haben einfach ... igitt, das habe ich also beim letzten Beuch in Vladayms Palast gerochen! Ha ha, der Gestank passt zu ihm."
languages.original_text: "Looks like the utility folks have really let themselves go; they've got shi— ahem, sewage spilling out right under the central square, but they just — eugh, so that's what I smelled last time I was in Vladaym's palace! Ha ha, the stench suits him."

traits.locale_text: "Anscheinend haben die vom Arbeitstrupp diesmal richtig geschlampt. Direkt unter dem Hauptplatz tritt Sch..., äh, Abwasser aus, und sie haben einfach ... igitt, das habe ich also beim letzten Beuch in Vladayms Palast gerochen! Ha ha, der Gestank passt zu ihm."

languages.text: « Le service d'entretien doit vraiment se tourner les pouces pour laisser toute cette mer... hum, ces eaux usées se déverser juste sous la place centrale, mais ils ont... Ah, mais c'était donc ça, l'odeur que j'ai sentie dans le palais de Vladaym ! Ha ha, cette puanteur lui va comme un gant. »
languages.original_text: "Looks like the utility folks have really let themselves go; they've got shi— ahem, sewage spilling out right under the central square, but they just — eugh, so that's what I smelled last time I was in Vladaym's palace! Ha ha, the stench suits him."

traits.locale_text: « Le service d'entretien doit vraiment se tourner les pouces pour laisser toute cette mer... hum, ces eaux usées se déverser juste sous la place centrale, mais ils ont... Ah, mais c'était donc ça, l'odeur que j'ai sentie dans le palais de Vladaym ! Ha ha, cette puanteur lui va comme un gant. »

languages.text: "Hizmet ekibi işleri iyice salmış baksana. Merkez meydanın tam altını bok... Şey yani, lağım suyu götürüyor ama herifler... Öğk. Demek Vladaym'ın sarayındayken aldığım koku buymuş. Ha ha! Tam ona layık."
languages.original_text: "Looks like the utility folks have really let themselves go; they've got shi— ahem, sewage spilling out right under the central square, but they just — eugh, so that's what I smelled last time I was in Vladaym's palace! Ha ha, the stench suits him."

traits.locale_text: "Hizmet ekibi iyice kendini salmış. Merkez meydanın tam altını bok... Öhöm. Lağım götürüyor ama onlar... Öğk. Bu kokuyu en son Vladaym'ın sarayında almıştım. Ha ha! Bu leş koku tam ona layık."
